output:
Music
Where, where was my bed?
I thought I was fed.
Music
I swear that I didn't come sit in this chair.
Music
Here, here, I guess that's fine.
It's only something forty-nine.
I'll sleep it off tomorrow if I can.
Music
Could I take the pills?
I think I'll take more.
I thought that I left them right here in the drawer.
I'll give it some, sit and think about
the last time that I took them out.
Maybe I will remember where they are.
Music
Bed, drawer, here, floor, where, more, bed.
Bed, here, bed, bed, bed, more, bed.
